description: This file contains utility functions written in shell script, primarily for network information retrieval, process management, and system utilities used in a Linux-based embedded environment.

methods.name: Timestamp
methods.description: Returns the current date and time in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'.

methods.name: getMacAddressOnly
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of the WAN interface, conditionally handling different box types.

methods.name: getSHA1
methods.description: Calculates and returns the SHA1 checksum of a given file.

methods.name: getIPAddress
methods.description: Determines and returns the IP address of the device, considering IPv4/IPv6 and box type.

methods.name: getCMIPAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the Cable Modem's IP address based on box type and network state.

methods.name: getErouterIPAddress
methods.description: Gets the eRouter's IP address, considering various conditions and box types.

methods.name: processCheck
methods.description: Checks if a process by name is running; returns '1' if not running, '0' if running.

methods.name: getMacAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of the device, with special handling based on box type.

methods.name: getErouterMacAddress
methods.description: Gets the MAC address of the eRouter.

methods.name: rebootFunc
methods.description: Performs a system reboot, with special handling for XB3 box type.

methods.name: Uptime
methods.description: Returns the system uptime in seconds.

methods.name: getFWVersion
methods.description: Gets the firmware version from the version.txt file.

methods.name: getBuildType
methods.description: Determines the build type ('vbn', 'prod', 'qa', 'dev') based on the firmware version.

methods.name: removeCron
methods.description: Removes a specific cron job based on a pattern.
